dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.billing.AppliedCustomerPenaltyCharge
dataStructure.description:
The AppliedCustomerPenaltyCharge is a type of AppliedCustomerBillingCharge. It represents penalty charges such as late fees, payment rejection fees, interests, that could be applied, linked to dunning of a due amount, in order to bill the customer according to contractual terms and conditions.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: AppliedCustomerPenaltyCharge

child.name: dunningCaseRule
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association DunningCaseRuleTriggersAppliedCustomerPenaltyCharge

This association end is optional
child.label: dunningCaseRule
